comments:

I think I have called the method correctly. You can create this error by running the test TarInputStream_PDETest in core.test.

You are calling the   copyEntryContents() on a TarInputStream which is actually only the header data (so, a single 512 bytes block), all the data (2408 bytes) which should follow on the stream is missing.

But you got a good point, i should catch the problem earlier and not let ByteArrayInputStream to throw the exception, or wrap it in a true Grid exception with a clear reason. I will see.
